entry_point.description: Relative path to the primary file needed to run/serve the template. For HTML/JS frameworks, this is typically the main HTML file (e.g., 'index.html'). For Python frameworks, it's the WSGI/ASGI application file (e.g., 'wsgi.py', 'app.py'). Can be null if not applicable or detectable.

static_dir.description: Relative path to the static assets directory (e.g., 'static/').

dependencies.description: List of dependencies required by the template (e.g., python packages, npm packages).

framework.description: The framework this template uses (matches metadata.framework).
